instruction.enter_numbers: Enter any 2 positive integers, and click “Next” button.

subtraction.error_min_lt_sub: Cannot subtract: the number to be subtracted is less than the number to be subtracted.
subtraction.step_intro: Let's do the subtraction step by step!
subtraction.step_borrow_1: Step {{step}} column ({{label}}): {{a}} is less than {{b}}, so we need to borrow a dozen (10) to {{adjustedA}}.
subtraction.step_payback: (Return the 1 borrowed in the previous step to {{b}})
subtraction.remember_borrowing: Remember, if you don't have enough to subtract, you have to borrow 1 from the next row!

multiplication.step_intro: Bước {{step}}: Nhân với chữ số hàng {{label}}
multiplication.step_zero_rule: Vì đang nhân với hàng chục/trăm nên cần thêm số 0 ở sau.
multiplication.shift_zero: Dịch hàng kết quả sang phải {{zeros}} số vì nhân với hàng {{label}}
multiplication.step_final_carry: Cuối cùng cộng thêm số nhớ {{carry}}

step1_description: Place the numbers {{number1}} and {{number2}} so that the digits in the same row and column are aligned.
step1_subText: Click the ( Next ) button to see detailed calculation steps.
add_description: Arrange the numbers in the correct column and add from right to left.
sub_description: Arrange the numbers in the correct column and subtract from right to left.
mul_description: We will multiply {{number1}} by {{number2}} from right to left, one digit at a time.
div_description: Divide {{number1}} by {{number2}}, starting with the leftmost digit.

speech.selectOperator: You've selected {{operator}}. Please enter new numbers
